title: De Soto National Memorial: Support Your Park
body: Explore This Park    Get Involved     Support Your Park             Support Your Park        April 5, 2008 rangers and volunteers set up a booth at the Manatee County Heritage Seafood Festival.    Â   De Soto National Memorial receives its base support from the National Park Service.  However, many special initiatives and educational programs are supported by donations from the community.  If you would like to support De Soto National Memorial with a cash donation, please Check out our donation site.
